body:
Hello,


The packages will be installed into the directory specified by packages
itself. I suppose they'll be somewhere in a /usr/bin, /usr/local/bin or
/opt/radiance. Not in your home directory anyway!


I'm unsure if the RAYPATH env. variable will be set automatically.


You may download the package I compiled for Ubuntu 7.10 myself:
http://www.bakharev.org/index.php?option=com_content&task=view&id=27&Itemid=38


The files will be installed into /usr/bin and /usr/lib. Also it sets all
the env. variables needed for Radiance to work.


Best Regards,
Ilya
